name: Inter-Dimension Connection
description:
Two universes ripped apart long ago, have now reunited. 

You play as Ash, an apprentice druid, and A54, a rebel assassin, both fighting their way through unknown worlds to get back home. 

Both characters will have to work together in order to win - you cannot heal yourself, only your counterpart. 

Survive long enough to press all switches to reveal the way back home. 

Use WASD/Arrow Keys to move, and mouse to aim and shoot.
